price: 167. « Si tu n’arrêtes pas, ô Loth, lui dirent-ils, tu seras banni. »
arabic: قَالُواْ لَئِن لَّمۡ تَنتَهِ يَٰلُوطُ لَتَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡمُخۡرَجِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qālū la-in lam tantahi yālūṭu latakūnanna mina al-mukh'rajīna
